So I modified some Sunday Punch stuff so could have larger RCS tanks. However (never modifying just copy and pasting) the texture file and renaming it makes the texture lighter on the model in game.

All U did was import the model into 3ds max 2011, Make the model shorter, change some UVs, and exported. suddenly it is lighter.

Note the different tone of black and odd shadowing.

It\'s all one smoothing group.

Try to make sure that the top and sides are different groups, otherwise it looks like that.
